skill.name: clinpgx-database
skill.description: Access ClinPGx pharmacogenomics data (successor to PharmGKB). Query gene-drug interactions, CPIC guidelines, allele functions, for precision medicine and genotype-guided dosing decisions.
skill.summary: Access ClinPGx pharmacogenomics data (successor to PharmGKB). Query gene-drug interactions, CPIC gui...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or persistence behaviors were found. Network calls target documented ClinPGx API endpoints with standard request handling and optional local caching.

content.value_statement: You need reliable pharmacogenomics data for gene and drug decisions. This skill queries ClinPGx endpoints and summarizes guidelines, alleles, and annotations.
actual_capabilities: Search drugs and chemicals by name
Get CPIC guideline listings and details
Export results to a pandas DataFrame
limitations: Requires network access to the ClinPGx API
Subject to a 2 requests per second rate limit
Data is limited to ClinPGx coverage and updates
Does not provide clinical decisions or medical advice

use_cases.title: Check gene drug guidance
use_cases.description: Look up CPIC recommendations and drug labels for a patient genotype review.

use_cases.title: Analyze allele frequencies
use_cases.description: Pull allele data for a gene and compare population frequency patterns.

use_cases.title: Validate PGx feature scope
use_cases.description: Assess available endpoints and data fields for a pharmacogenomics product roadmap.

prompt_templates.title: Gene drug lookup
prompt_templates.prompt: Find ClinPGx gene drug pairs for CYP2C19 and clopidogrel, and summarize the sources and evidence level.

prompt_templates.title: Guideline check
prompt_templates.prompt: List CPIC guidelines for CYP2D6 and codeine with the guideline names and last updated dates if available.

prompt_templates.title: Allele profile
prompt_templates.prompt: Get CYP2D6 allele functions and population frequencies, and highlight the most common decreased or no function alleles.

prompt_templates.title: Batch gene review
prompt_templates.prompt: For genes CYP2C19, CYP2D6, and TPMT, summarize top gene drug pairs with CPIC level A evidence.

output_examples.input: Summarize CPIC guidance for CYP2C19 and clopidogrel.
output: Guideline: CPIC Guideline for CYP2C19 and clopidogrel
Key note: alternative therapy for poor metabolizers

best_practices: Respect the 2 requests per second rate limit
Cache repeated queries for large panels
Check evidence levels before interpreting results
anti_patterns: Using results as direct medical advice
Assuming all clinically relevant alleles are covered

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: It works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code when network access to the ClinPGx API is available.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: The API is rate limited to 2 requests per second and coverage depends on ClinPGx data updates.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the script offers Python functions and optional pandas export for data workflows.

faq.question: Is my data sent to third parties?
faq.answer: Only your query parameters are sent to the ClinPGx API; no local files are transmitted by default.

faq.question: What if the API returns errors?
faq.answer: Use retry logic with backoff and handle 404 or 429 responses as shown in the examples.

faq.question: How does this compare to PharmGKB?
faq.answer: ClinPGx is the successor to PharmGKB and consolidates CPIC, PharmCAT, and related sources.
